title: El Vilsito
description: Famous for their tacos al pastor, featuring marinated pork slow-roasted on a vertical spit with pineapple

title: El Huequito
description: Mexican-style burrito filled with tender, pressed pork cracklings (chicharrón prensado), often cooked in a rich, flavorful tomato-based sauce.

title: Cafe De Tacuba
description: Featuring poblano chiles stuffed with a savory mixture of meat, fruits, and spices, topped with a creamy walnut-based sauce and pomegranate seeds.

title: Tamaleria Nativitas
description: Dishes made of dough from corn filled with meats, cheeses, vegetables, or chilies, wrapped in corn husks or banana leaves, and steamed.

title: Los Machetes de Amparito
description: Large folded tortillas filled with melted cheese and often additional ingredients like meats or vegetables. Have generous size and crispy edges.

title: Restaurante Nicos
description: Featuring corn tortillas filled with shredded chicken, topped with a rich red chili sauce, and garnished with fresh cheese, onions, and cream.

title: La Casa de Tono en Zona Rosa
description: Hearty Mexican stew made with large kernels of hominy, tender pork or chicken, and flavorful broth. It’s typically garnished with shredded cabbage, radishes, onions, lime, and chili.

title: Mux Restaurante
description: Vibrant Mexican sauce made with fresh green ingredients like tomatillos, cilantro, pumpkin seeds, and green chilies.

title: Los Callejeros
description: Featuring grilled, marinated chicken strips served sizzling with sautéed bell peppers and onions wrapped in warm tortillas with toppings like salsa, guacamole, and sour cream.

title: Tostadas
description: Crispy tortilla topped with fresh, flavorful crab meat (jaiba), usually mixed with mayonnaise, lime, and seasonings.

title: Elotes y Esquites Los Juniors
description: Grilled or boiled corn on the cob, coated with mayonnaise, cheese, chili powder, lime juice, and butter. Combination of sweet, spicy, and tangy tastes.

title: Potzollcalli
description: Avocado mixed with fresh ingredients like tomatoes, onions, chili peppers, and herbs. Enjoyed with tortilla chips or as a topping for various dishes.

title: La Burrita
description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, seasoned meat, beans, jalapeños, and fresh toppings like salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.
